https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/anCwdplXqITmCnXQvpwTMCy24Np.jpg Fabien, former star of a television show, always seems disoriented when he wakes up. He feels abandoned since the disappearance of Corinne, his co-star, whom he loved so much. Nothing surprises him already, not even his encounter with Yoni, a sad young man, who carries in a bag a beautiful and disturbing token of his own loss. Blonde Animals
